title: Belphegor - Conjuring The Dead  mp3   2014
description:
Belphegor - Conjuring The Dead  mp3 2014 What we got...Conjuring the Dead is the tenth studio album by the Austrian blackened death metal band Belphegor. It was released on August 5, 2014, through Nuclear Blast. The album was recorded by Erik Rutan at Mana Recording Studios in USA. The album was preceded by the digital download single "Gasmask Terror", which was released on July 1, 2014. Earlier, on June 25, a lyric video for the same son was released.

A music video was shot for the title track, which was directed by Walter Fanninger. The album features cover art by Septicflesh bassist Seth Siro Anton.
